column5: Here's a couple of news articles that were in a local weekly newspaper today. Incredible..    Wayyy over limit  Fish left to rot
Horrible news on both accounts. Whats going on with these people? It's hard to believe that these are true. Especially the rainbows!  Easton
thats alot of bows.... If they wanna catch some belly slashers go to Bronte creek... bows and salmon without the eggs everywhere during runs... it is disgusting to say the least...
I hope they get the book thrown at them if that isn't reason to remove ones testicles as punishment , I don't know what is
LOL Terry "remove a testicle" ouch I know it's not funny but the statement struck me as.  DanC Thats just terrible, waisted resource thats for sure  Whopper

Yes, I read that first link earlier today Dan, before the 2nd link.  The first ones will probably have the book thrown at them for sure(if there is any justice), hopefully the 2nd link someone will know something about it, and provide info to the MNR about it.

Maybe if the courts would hand out reasonable fines, and the money stayed with the MNR - then the MNR would probably be self supporting and not in the shape its in!   Take all their stuff - then hang em'   Don
It happens a lot more often than we think or would like.  They nabbed two guys up here spearing spawning walleye last week.
